https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lcrqb0Ea89fd7ZUgb0xNmVGMpmx.jpg Horror - Buried beneath the Mexican desert for 50 years, vampire Luis Diego (Justin Quinn) wakes with a thirst for vengeance when a treasure hunter unearths him. But after falling for a beautiful mortal (Brenda Romero), he begins to believe he may have a second chance at life and love. While trying to quell his inner demons, however, the lovelorn bloodsucker finds that the monster within is not so easily subdued. - Justin Quinn, Brenda Romero, Na√≠m Thomas Desert of Blood
